CustomField.description: This is a system field that should never be updated by the user. It is a calculation of the number of days that a task is not being worked on based on the start date and the length of the task. If a Cannot End Before date has been specified, the Non Working days will be 0 unless the Cannot End Before date is the day before a Non Working day
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a system field and should never be visible.
CustomField.label: Non Working Days Total
